title: What Happened to the Lunar Revel Skins?
body:
It was mentioned here at http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-new-year-these-lunar-revel-sales that the legacy skins Warring Kingdoms Tryndamere and Dragonblade Riven were to be staying until the 23rd of February. Why are they unavilable? As shown in the attached image, I own Riven and her other three skins are available for purchase, but not her Dragonblade skin. I have also noticed that all the other Lunar Revel skins, including the 2015 skins, which are not supposed to legacy, are also missing from the shop.

Edit: Issue resolved!

replies.body:
They're not legacy skins, and shouldn't leave the store.  We're working to get this issue resolved ASAP.

EDIT: Lunar Revel skins should once again be in the store!
same question. I just want to get this Jinx skin! Jumped through hoops to get my RP, was going to get it last night but paycheck issues.
